DOC.detailed_description: Holmium laser enucleation prostate ( HoLEP ) mechanical morcellation surgical technique use treatment bladder outlet obstruction ( BOO ) secondary benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) . HoLEP represent state art alternative transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) . HoLEP show safe effective treating prostate size low perioperative morbidity . A holmium laser fiber pass continuous-flow resectoscope use resect obstruct prostate tissue ( enucleation ) . After enucleation perform , resect tissue advance bladder . The morcellator use cut tissue small piece remove bladder via suction morcellator blade ( morcellation ) . We currently use first commercially available morcellator ( VersaCut , Lumenis Incorporated , Santa Clara , CA ) . The Storz continuous-flow resectoscope ( Karl Storz , Tuttlingen , Germany ) currently use perform enucleation portion procedure . Recently , new morcellator develop ( Piranha , Richard Wolf , Knittlingen , Germany ) . The Wolf morcellator report remove tissue faster rate Lumenis device
